title: Another Life
lyrics:
I remember the look on your face
It plays on my mind as I lie awake
I heard your voice at the end of a tape
Static flickers and fades away
Yeah I know that I've made my mistakes

But I hope that I see you again

I'll see you in another life

I'll see you in another life

I'll see you in another life



Pain, it comes and goes in waves

The colours are starting to fade away

I call, I call and I talk to your friends

Passing time as it bends and breaks



Yeah I know that I've made my mistakes

But I hope that I see you again

I'll see you in another life

I'll see you in another life

I'll see you in another life



So I guess this is time to say goodbye

Yeah I guess this is time to close the door

So I guess this is time to say goodbye

Yeah I guess this is time to say goodnight

I'll see you in another life

I'll see you in another life

I'll see you in another life

I'll see you in another life
